articles.author: The Conversation
articles.title: World's Oldest Known Human Footprint Identified in South Africa - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Just over two decades ago, as the new millennium began, it seemed that tracks left by our ancient human ancestors dating back more than about 50,000 years were excessively rare.
articles.content:
Just over two decades ago, as the new millennium began, it seemed that tracks left by our ancient human ancestors dating back more than about 50,000 years were excessively rare.
